arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Saint-Étienne 1-0 Lille: Mathieu Cafaro’s strike secures victory over lethargic Lille
arts.sum: Ligue 1 McDonald’s, Round 4, 13/09/2024 AS Saint-Étienne collected their first points of the season as they recorded a 1-0 victory over a frustrated and tired-looking Lille OSC at the…

arts.ttl: Lille’s Angel Gomes targeting a return to Manchester United
arts.sum: According to Manchester Evening News, Lille midfielder Angel Gomes (24) has a long-term ambition to return to Manchester United. The newly-capped England international has received lots of praise after being named…

arts.ttl: Saint-Étienne predicted XI v Lille: Yvann Macon absent, Pierre Ekwah set for debut
arts.sum: AS Saint-Étienne haven’t had a strong start to the season. Les Verts are yet to score since their return to Ligue 1, have lost all three matches, and currently sit rock-bottom of…

arts.ttl: Lille predicted XI v Saint-Étienne: England international Angel Gomes to start
arts.sum: It was a mixed international window for Lille OSC. On the one hand, one of their key players, Angel Gomes, returns having earned his first caps for the England national…

arts.ttl: Angel Gomes: England's new boy a 'top January target' for Premier League club
arts.sum: Former Man United youngster Angel Gomes - who now plies his trade with Lille - is reportedly a top target for a Premier League club ahead of the January transfer window.

arts.ttl: How Angel Gomes has become Man Utd's PERFECT midfield transfer solution
arts.sum: It is a style of play that United’s midfield has cried out for under Erik ten Hag and, with Gomes entering the final year of his contract at Lille, his breakthrough could not have come at a better time for both the player and the Red Devils. Few could have predicted the turnaround in fortunes for Angel Gomes but Manchester United now have the chance to rectify a huge mistake and bring home the missing link to their midfield.

arts.ttl: Official | Bafodé Diakité extends Lille deal
arts.sum: Lille OSC centre-back Bafodé Diakité (23) has put pen to paper over a two-year contract extension, the Ligue 1 side announced. The 23-year-old is now tied to Les Dogues over…

arts.ttl: Angel Gomes has already made mind up on Man Utd return amid transfer interest
arts.sum: Former Manchester United starlet Angel Gomes won his first England cap after impressing with Lille and the midfielder has now been linked with a return to the Premier League

arts.ttl: Newcastle make Angel Gomes 'top target' - but face huge competition for England star
arts.sum: Angel Gomes - who left Manchester United in 2020 - will become a free agent next summer, allowing clubs to begin pre-contract negotiations with the 24-year-old Lille midfielder as early as January

arts.ttl: Man Utd should pull out all the stops to get Angel Gomes back after bright England bow
arts.sum: Angel Gomes can leave on a free transfer at the end of the season, with the January transfer window being Lille’s only chance of making any money from a player they have developed expertly
